hello,
 
I have to make a piece of work for my school. and i hope that someone can give me some answers. I choose the samurai as subject so that's why i'm hoping you can help me. I've got a lots of questions but i'm happy if someone can answer at leats a bit of those.
 
- what did Japan look like in the time of the samurai?trees? houses?
- can you give me some information of the class system that was in japan around the time of the system. I kwno that samurai was the hightest class.
- what things did they eat?
- can you give me some information about the theaceremonie? I heard about it but I don't know what it contains.
- does anyone now what was know about medicines, recovery and remedies in that time? or about alternative remedy methodes? 
in our piece of work has to be something about biology, anyone suggestions?
- what fighting technics did they use?
- and how are those related to the current japanese fighting sports? ( I know it's not really about history, but maybe someone knows something about this) 
- wich wapens did tey use?
- what kind of fighting equipment did they use?
- in wich year ended the rule of the samurai?
- how did they line up in a fight?
- did they use horses while fighting? an if yes how?
 
I want to thank you in forward. and I hope someone can help me. 
 
greetings, shannon
